mapper.sql: id, type, busiType, hasWeb, webForce, hasWechat, wechatForce, hasMessage, messageForce, createTime, lastUpdate
mapper.select: SELECT s.type, s.busiType, s.hasWeb, s.webForce, s.hasWechat, s.wechatForce, s.hasMessage, s.messageForce, u.userId, s.id as settingId, IFNULL(u.web,if(s.hasWeb = 1,1,0)) as web, IFNULL(u.wechat,if(s.hasWechat = 1,1,0)) as wechat, IFNULL(u.message,if(s.hasMessage = 1,1,0)) as message FROM msg_subscription_setting s LEFT JOIN ( select userId, settingId, web, wechat, message from msg_subscription_user where userId= #{userId} ) u on u.settingId = s.id where 1 = 1 AND s.type = #{type} AND s.busiType = #{busiType} ORDER BY s.createTime DESC
